title: We are searching for a proactive Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to manage multiple ad accounts.
job_overview:
We are searching for a proactive Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to manage multiple ad accounts.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on performance

Job Responsibilities:

Run campaigns on Google & Meta Ads.

Ensure efficiency through monitoring and optimization.

Report on KPIs to ensure success metrics are met.

Requirements:

1+ year in a digital advertising role.

Strong data analysis skills.

Ability to work remotely with minimal supervision.
